About

Current skillset:

  • HTML 5
  • CSS 3
  • jQuery
  • Photoshop
  • Illustrator
  • Sass
  • Bootstrap
  • JavaScript

Hi, I'm Kamila.

I craft modern websites with attention to detail and user experience. I love responsive design and I'm not a stranger to design for print plus I have an eye for branding. I have 5+ years of experience in:

  • Website Design
  • Responsive Design
  • Front-end Development
  • Branding
  • App Design
  • Banner Design
  • . . .

I write clean and validable code using HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript and jQuery. I can make it work in older browsers as well.

I'm always looking for interesting work opportunities so if you have a project in mind I'd be delighted to hear from you.
